details:
Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ubit Information Technologies STOYS allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects STOYS: from 2 through 20250916.Â 

NOTE: The vendor did not inform about the completion of the fixing process within the specified time. The CVE will be updated when new information becomes available.
